subject_knowledge_what_to_improve: Your subject knowledge statement does not refer to your subject knowledge in Maths at all.
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: Please get a reference from the primary school or the supply agency you are currently working for.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: As you are currently employed you cannot supply 2 charakter references. For safeguarding reasons at least one reference must be from your current employer.
qualifications_other_reason_details: Unfortunately you do not meet our entry requirements. Applicants for our Maths course need to have either a degree in Maths or at least an A Level in Maths of grade C or above.
